title: BRIEF-Cairn Energy Announces Completion Drilling Of Wildcat Well 03/17a-3
text:
BRIEF-Cairn Energy Announces Completion Drilling Of Wildcat Well 03/17a-3

Stock Markets 4 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 11:54)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cairn Energy Announces Completion Drilling Of Wildcat Well 03/17a-3 Oct 17 (Reuters) - Cairn Energy PLC : * CAIRN ENERGY PLC - CHIMERA WELL UPDATE * CAIRN ENERGY PLC - CAIRN, OPERATOR OF UKCS LICENCE P2312, HAS COMPLETED DRILLING OF WILDCAT WELL 03/17A-3, KNOWN AS CHIMERA * CAIRN ENERGY PLC - OBJECTIVE OF WELL WAS TO PROVE HYDROCARBONS IN PALEOCENE HEIMDAL SANDSTONES WITHIN LISTA FORMATION. WELL IS DRY

BRIEF-Cairn Energy Announces Completion Drilling Of Wildcat Well 03/17a-3
description: BRIEF-Cairn Energy Announces Completion Drilling Of Wildcat Well 03/17a-3
